name: Non-Khorne Daemonhosts gain 2000xp's worth of powers, from any disciplines and ignoring requirements.

system.novice: Daemonhost gains bony blades or other such weapons that fuse to their limbs. Their natural weapnons now inflict 2d10 damage.

description.value: Novice: Daemonhost gains bony blades or other such weapons that fuse to their limbs. Their natural weapnons now inflict 2d10 damage.
